docs.lead_paragraph: MODERN fashion in pictures has deserted the paintings which tell some story and has turned its favors and face toward those from which all anecdote is absent, landscapes that express by color and composition an intangible beauty akin to music, figure pieces in which the human form is employed for decorative effect, while the color scheme affects the nerves like subtle odors.

headline.main: OLD DUTCH GENRE PAINTING AND ITS EXPONENTS; Frans Hals and His Followers Well Represented in New York Galleries -- Inspiration and Keynote of Their Work -- A Far Cry from the Latter Day Fashion in Art.
